biotools.summary: Discriminative HMMs (Hidden Markov models) predicts localizations using motifs that are present in a compartment but absent in other, nearby, compartments by utilizing an hierarchical structure that mimics the protein sorting mechanism.

bioschemas.name: Discriminative HMMs
